alert.note: Alert for Banks; Barrow; Gwinnett; Hall; Jackson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 7:04PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Barrow, northeastern Gwinnett, southern Banks, southern Hall and Jackson Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 704 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Banks Crossing to Rest Haven, and moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Gainesville, Winder, Jefferson, Commerce, Homer, Buford, Braselton, Auburn, Flowery Branch, Oakwood, Maysville, Arcade, Nicholson, Hoschton, Pendergrass, Carl, Gillsville, Talmo, Rest Haven and Candler. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
